content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>Public Works Street Maintenance</origin>         <title>Curb Ramps</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>This data set is the location of existing pedestrian curb ramps and those that are remaining to be installed within the City and County of Denver</abstract>       <purpose>This data set will aid in planning travel paterns for disabled citizens and for programming installation and repair programs.</purpose>     </descript>     <timeperd>       <timeinfo>         <sngdate>           <caldate>unknown</caldate>         </sngdate>       </timeinfo>       <current>Unknown</current>     </timeperd>     <status>       <progress>In work</progress>       <update>As needed</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.109688</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.734489</eastbc>         <northbc>39.825608</northbc>         <southbc>39.614352</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>infrastructure</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>transportation</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:   None.   USE CONSTRAINTS: The City and County of Denver is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the City and County of Denver, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use.   ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE City and County of Denver IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  Data or information provided by the City and County of Denver shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the City and County of Denver, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data/information provided.
